name: Break Circle
description:
1. “Break Circle” is a very simple, very funny, addictive casual game.
2. By continuously rotating the pointer, capturing the moment, click on the arc in the circle in turn.
3. If the green arc is hit, the circle is broken 1 point. If the red arc is hit, the circle is broken 2 point.
4. Carefully and carefully, do not make any mistake and stick to it, then the circle will be completely broken!
5. Try it right now! How many circles can you break? How far will you go?

If you have any questions or suggestions, please email us at contact@mudotek.com.
